author: jlidrych
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of [#42956](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42956)

This PR is related to this [issue](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/error-in-hiexpress-harvesting-for-run-374595/30125/8).
The proposed changes should be harmless - only unnecessary re-binning is removed.

#### PR validation:

See [#42956](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42956)

#### Backporting:

Backport of [#42956](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42956)
title: [13_2_X]Remove rebin from SiStripBadAPVandHotStripAlgorithm
